text: The 2015-16 Austrian football championship was the 105th season of a top Austrian league and the 42nd under the name Bundesliga. The league was played by ten teams. They determined the Austrian football champions in four rounds. Salzburg and Vienna each had two clubs, Burgenland, Carinthia, Lower Austria, Upper Austria, Styria and Vorarlberg each had one. Tyrol was the only federal state not represented by a team in Austria's top division. SKN St. Pölten was promoted to the Bundesliga. In the 2015-16 season, as in previous years, ten clubs competed against each other in a total of 36 rounds. Each team played twice at home and away against every other team. FC Red Bull Salzburg secured the championship title. It was the 10th title. The sports betting provider Tipico was the main sponsor. The official league name was Tipico-Bundesliga. The TV provider sky Deutschland AG had the rights to show all Bundesliga games in full length. They were broadcasted on Sky Sport Austria channel . ==Final table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. Wolfsberger AC 36 11 10 15 43 7\. SV Ried 36 11 9 16 42 8\. SCR Altach 36 11 7 18 40 9\. SV Mattersburg 36 10 9 17 39 10\. SV Grödig 36 9 8 19 35 After relegation, SV Grödig declared its return to amateur football and returned to the Regional league.
